## `SetPlotBackgroundColor` {#standard-setplotbackgroundcolor}

Sets the plot area color for all graphs. The color is created by specifying the red, blue, and green channels of the color.
(Values should be between **0** -- **255**.)

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetPlotBackgroundColor(number red,
                       number green,
                       number blue)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`number` red | The red channel of the color.
`number` green | The green channel of the color.
`number` blue | The blue channel of the color.
